description: Situated on the ground floor of the Palazzo della Gherardesca and surrounded by beautiful mature gardens, Il Palagio is a gourmet evening restaurant decorated in elegant, refined neo-Classic style...
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Brunch, Garden or park, Interesting wine list, Restaurant offering vegetarian menus, Terrace, Wheelchair access
creditCards: American Express credit card, Credit card / Debit card accepted, Diners Club credit card, Mastercard credit card, Visa credit card
